name: HiQ Ace Deluxe
summary:
Deluxe edition contains all 192 previously released levels.

In the puzzle race become the HiQ Ace.
Enjoy the high quality classic jigsaw puzzle game with the arcade twist.
Master your mind and sharpen your eyes to be the jigsaw puzzle master - the HiQ Ace.
Unlock two additional game modes. In Relax Mode there are only puzzle pieces and you. If you seek more challenge, then pick the Expert mode.
Discover dozens of beautiful high definition puzzle boards. Play fast to unlock the power-ups and beat the clock.
